settings.ggp1jl-k_I2_text: BOOK YOUR PARIS WEDDING OR VOW RENEWAL PACKAGE

settings.gg84Vtzl_FE_text: Choose your preferred date and share a few details with us about your event.
settings.ggxRo-S1w8A_text: Make a deposit of €500 (euros) to secure your date. Not ready to book today? Choose your date now, and we'll reserve it at no cost for 48 hours.
settings.ggTvI-ZUvOy_text: Meet your personal planner.  Optional: customize your event with products and services in our Wedding Shop.

settings.ggPqX4iJj0d_text: Your Wedding & Vow renewal in Paris package includes:
settings.ggNxGqULG3Y_childItem_1: Outdoor symbolic ceremony at a venue of your choice for up to 15 guests
settings.ggNxGqULG3Y_childItem_3: Professional wedding photographer for your ceremony plus two-hour Paris photo tour  **

settings.ggrCBt6Uf6z_text: Spread the Love Spread the cost
settings.gg4XcWpt7Kr_text:
Take advantage of our payment plan and spread the cost of your package if your event is over three months (12 weeks) away at the time of booking:

  • A €500 (euros) non-refundable deposit is due upon booking to secure your date
  • A second payment of €1,462.50 (euros) is due 90 days before your event
  • The final payment of €1,462.50 (euros) is due 30 days before your event

If your event is less than three months away, you’ll be required to pay the full amount. 
See Terms and Conditions.
settings.ggRiQ92T3Aw_text: Secure online payment by credit card, Paypal or bank transfer via Wise
settings.ggl4NoE6JBz_label: I’m ready to book my Paris wedding / vow renewal package now
settings.ggfqhFG7gjx_label: I’d like to save the date for 48 hours, at no cost

settings.ggREJxtGRnc_text: "The entire team were magnificent. The pricing was reasonable and professionalism was respectable. My wife and I were very pleased with the experience of our 10 year vow renewal at the Eiffel tower."
settings.gg1wStq7Oaf_text: "The transportation was flexible and very nice, I have three small kids and was still able to get a luxurious van with chauffeur. The florist went above and beyond to ensure the specific details and request from my wife were executed properly. The photographer was personable with the photos. Thank you to the entire team for making this an experience we'll both cherish for a lifetime.”
settings.gg4Kdv7qDlT_text: "From eloping to renewing your vows, I’d recommend Perfect Paris Wedding to everyone. Claire made this whole experience just the way we wanted it. We’re already planning our renewal in Paris in years to come and we’ll be repeat clients."
settings.ggUgmqG2Zhf_text: "Joleen, my make-up artist, listened to my preferences for make-up and hair and nailed it. She made me feel so beautiful and I also wanted to become her best friend!”

settings.gg2JO0DGt53_text: Easy to book. Easy to plan. Easy to enjoy.
settings.ggdA0P8H9a4_label: or reserve your date at no cost for 48 hours
